imgur.name: Imgur
imgur.description: Popular image hosting with easy sharing and robust features.
imgur.details: Imgur is a widely used online image sharing community and image host, known for its simplicity and large user base. It offers convenient image uploading and direct linking.

features.text: Direct image links for easy embedding
Subject to API rate limits for frequent uploads
Requires a client ID for API authorization
No official guarantee of permanent file storage for anonymous uploads

imgur.upload_command: curl -s -H "Authorization: Client-ID fc2a3faf090d08b" -F "image=@$1" https://api.imgur.com/3/image | tee >(sed -n 's/.*"deletehash":"\([^"]*\)".*/\1/p' | while read h; do echo "[$(date +%F_%T)] $h"; done >> "$XDG_CONFIG_HOME/imgur-delete-hashes.txt") | sed -n 's/.*"link":"\([^"]*\)".*/\1/p' | sed 's/\\//g'

catbox.name: Catbox
catbox.description: Simple and free file hosting with permanent storage.
catbox.details: Catbox.moe is a straightforward file hosting service designed for simplicity and permanence. It allows users to upload various file types, including images, with no account required.

features.text: No user account or registration needed
No formal uptime Service Level Agreement (SLA)
Does not feature built-in album or gallery support

0x0.name: 0x0.st
0x0.details: 0x0.st is an open-source command-line pastebin and file upload service. It provides temporary hosting for files, typically retaining them for 30 days.

features.text: Files are available for 30 days by default
Uploaded files expire automatically after 30 days

gofile.name: GoFile.io
gofile.description: Free and robust file sharing platform for large files.
gofile.details: GoFile.io is a versatile file sharing service that allows users to upload and share files of various sizes. It's known for its ease of use and support for large uploads without requiring an account.

features.text: Files are hosted temporarily and may expire
API usage is subject to rate limits
Access may be restricted in some geographical regions
